metadata.title: CVE-2016-1239 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
duck before 0.10 did not properly handle loading of untrusted code from thecurrent directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

duck - 0.7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: duck package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
